org.treetank.bucket

Class DataBucket

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.bucket.DataBucket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBucket

    public final class DataBucket
extends Object
implements IBucket

    DataBucket

    A data bucket stores a set of datas.

    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz, Marc Kramis, University of Konstanz
